mapper.select: select n.id, n.title, n.content, n.user_id, to_char(n.created_at, 'yy/mm/dd') as created_at, d.dname from notice n join users u on n.user_id = u.id join emp e using(empno) join dept d using(deptno) order by n.id desc offset #{page} * 10 rows fetch next 10 rows only
select n.*, d.dname from notice n join users u on n.user_id = u.id join emp e using(empno) join dept d using(deptno) where n.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, user_id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userId})
